questions.text: What do you expect from your Perl Monger group?
answers: Meeting like minded people to socialize with.
Help in finding my next job.
Asking questions on the mailing list within a small group of people.
Discussing Perl issues in my own mother-tongue.

questions.text: What kinds of meetings do you prefer?
answers: A mix of technical and social meetings

questions.text: How often do you attend your Perl Monger group meetings?
If you don't regularly attend your Perl Monger meetings, what is the reason?
answers: Wrong kind of meeting (prefer social to technical or the reverse)

questions.text: Do you attend any other programming or technical user group meetings? If so, which ones?
What is your preferred content/level of presentations?
answers: Introductions to Perl / development tools and methods.
Various domain-specific topics and problem-solving overviews.
Various domain-specific modules and solutions in-depth.

questions.text: what other languages and technologies are regular topic on your meetings?
What is your primary PM group?
answers: list of active groups from pm.org
